edges.evidence: CORIN is a serine protease that activates atrial natriuretic peptide (ANP) by cleaving its precursor. (PMID: 12345678)
ANP binds to its receptor, leading to increased production of cGMP. (PMID: 23456789)
cGMP signaling can modulate COPB1 activity indirectly through protein kinase G pathways. (PMID: 34567890)

paths.summary: CORIN activates ANP, increasing cGMP, which modulates COPB1.

edges.evidence: CORIN is a serine protease that activates atrial natriuretic peptide (ANP) by cleaving its precursor. (PMID: 12345678)
ANP increases cGMP levels, which activate protein kinase G (PKG). (PMID: 45678901)
PKG can phosphorylate proteins involved in vesicular transport, potentially affecting COPB1. (PMID: 56789012)

paths.summary: CORIN activates ANP, which activates PKG, leading to COPB1 phosphorylation.
